description: This beef stroganoff recipe is an easy meal to make for dinner. It's creamy, rich and will warm up everyone around the dinner table.
name: Easy Beef Stroganoff Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a small jug, combine the sour cream and cornflour. Stir into the pan and simmer for 1 minute. Return beef and any juices to pan and simmer for 2 minutes. Spoon sauce over pasta and sprinkle with parsley leaves to serve.
